welcome_language_selection: Murakaza neza kuri AgriVet. Hitamo ururimi ukunda:
invalid_main_menu_option: Wahisemo nabi. Hitamo icyo ushaka gukora:
feature_coming_soon: Wahisemo %s. Iyi serivisi izaboneka vuba. Kanda %s kugira ngo usubire ku Murongo Mukuru.
invalid_name_input: Izina si ryo. Injira izina ripfuye (ntirigomba kurenza inyuguti {{max}}):
farmer_registration_success: Murakoze, {{name}}! Kwiyandikisha kwawe kwarangiye ku Intara ya {{province}}, Akarere ka {{district}}, Umurenge wa {{sector}}, Akagari ka {{cell}}.
farmer_already_registered: Wamaze kwiyandikisha muri AgriVet. Ushobora guhindura amakuru yawe cyangwa ukabona izindi serivisi.

service_request_success: Icyifuzo cyatanzwe! Impuguke {{graduateName}} izaguhamagara vuba. Nimero y'icyifuzo: {{requestId}}.
service_request_no_match: Ntabwo twabashije kubona impuguke iboneka mu karere kawe ubu. Icyifuzo cyawe cyanditswe (ID: {{requestId}}), kandi tuzakumenyesha iyo impuguke ibonetse.
service_request_failed: Gutanga icyifuzo byarananiranye. Ongera ugerageze nyuma.
farmer_not_registered:
Ugomba kuba waramaze kwiyandikisha kugirango usabe serivisi. Hitamo 1 Kwiyandikisha nka Muhinzi.
0. Subira ku Murongo Mukuru
weather_info_loading: CON Mubonye amakuru y'ibihe mu karere kanyu...
weather_info_unavailable: END Amakuru y'ibihe ntabwo aboneka mu karere kanyu muri iki gihe.
weather_service_error: END Serivisi y'amakuru y'ibihe irangwa. Ongera usubire mukanya.
farming_tips_menu:
CON Hitamo uburyo bw'ubuhinzi:
1. Uburyo bwo gutera Ibigori
2. Ukwirinda indwara z'ibishyimbo
3. Gukoresha neza ubutaka
4. Ubuzima bw'amatungo
0. Subira kumenu nyamukuru
farming_tip_maize: END üåΩ Guterera Ibigori: Tera mu gihe cy'imvura. Shyira intera ya cm 75 hagati y'imirongo, cm 25 hagati y'ibimera. Koresha ifumbire cyangwa ifumbire kugirango ubone umusaruro mwiza.
farming_tip_beans: END ü´ò Kubungabunga Ibishyimbo: Bitera mu butaka buhehereye. Raba inda z'ibishyimbo n'izindi ndwara. Hindura ibihingwa kugirango wirinde indwara.
farming_tip_soil: END üå± Kubungabunga ubutaka: Pima ubutaka. Ongeramo ifumbire. Hindura ibihingwa. Kora amaterasi kugirango wirinde igishanga.
farming_tip_livestock: END üêÑ Ubuzima bw'amatungo: Tanga amazi meza. Rindira buri gihe. Sugira aho batuye. Raba ibimenyetso by'indwara.
